text: <@UHDEVB0S1> I will be able to help you with technical Support.

Hey!

My team is looking for a freelance developer/agency that can help us manage both the technical side of our HubSpot website and our programmatic pages through Strapi (our headless CMS). I imagine it will be 10-20 hours a month with potential to do more if needed. 

We need someone that knows HubL like the back of their hand and is very familiar with JavaScript frameworks.

Website is <https://www.workstream.us/|https://www.workstream.us/>

Please DM me with your rates, portfolio, and any questions. 

CC: <@U03NBDQT2AH>

_*UPDATE*_: Found someone to help. Thank you!
-----------------------------------------------------
Hello,

I have been working on a theme for our <https://realmfive.com/|website>, but I need more work to be done and I don't have the time to do it all. Is there a freelancer here that would be interested in helping me finish a few items:
• Header / Navigation
• Updated Hero Module
• Basic animation (Motion One/GSAP) for elements on the page
• Looks for errors on the theme work
I based it on the boilerplate.

Please DM me with rates, example work, etc.
We offer outsourcing services, so we can definitely help :wink: Just sent you a DM

Hi Zach,

I can help you with your given changes. I am HubSpot Specialist and HubSpot Certified Developer.
